commits.author: Dawid Weiss
Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew: /** * Creates a field for numeric values using the default * precisionStep {@link NumericUtils#PRECISION_STEP_DEFAULT} (4). * The instance is not yet initialized with a numeric value, before indexing a * document containing this field, set a value using the various set * ???Value() methods. This constructor creates an indexed, but not * stored field. * * @param name * the field name */ public NumericField(String name) { this(name, NumericUtils.PRECISION_STEP_DEFAULT, NumericField.TYPE_UNSTORED); }

commits.author: Michael McCandless
